name: HarryPotterFacts
0:
”Alexa, open harry potter facts”
”tell me a fact”
”give me something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: harry potter facts
des: This skill "Harry Potter Facts" gives the user the most unknown facts about Harry Potter, his school, his friends and much more. The skill is free of cost and can be launched by simply saying, "Alexa, open harry potter facts". And later on, Alexa will reply with a random fact each time being asked.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
